website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Air Huarache Ultra, a stripped down version of the iconic Huarache shoes, is popular than ever as it maintains a lightweight and durable finish. With excellent materials, this version is well-loved for being comfortable and breathable.Its design is sleek yet stylish. While it has some minor flaws, what draws many sneaker loyalists to this design is its very reasonable price tag.
pros: Some buyers love packing the Nike Air Huarache Ultras when traveling as they are lightweight and folds easily to fit in a travel bag
A couple of reviewers like the Air sole cushioning as it provides midsole durability
The price tag is deemed reasonable by some users
Many users love that it has an extremely comfortable snug fit
Commenters online love the shoe ventilation brought about by the three-layer mesh and perforated foam upper making the sneakers more breathable than the original Huarache
A loyal fan of the women’s and men’s Nike Air Huarache Run Ultra casual shoes likes that the kicks are available in a wide range of sizes
Several wearers with flat feet love the removable insole feature as they can replace it with custom-made orthotics
Others love this extremely light shoe that is suitable for the track, in the gym, and even in the basketball court because of its good ankle support at the back
Many women like wearing these shoes due to its summer-ready colorways that brighten any outfit
cons: Some users claim it is difficult to wash off really bad stains and dirt
One negative reviewer claims the Nike Air Huarache Ultra makes so much squeaking noise when used

customer_reviews.title: Fast runners
customer_reviews.text: Light weight trainers. I first realised how brilliant they are when I got chased by a bear in the woods. I ran a lot faster than usual. I believe this is due to these trainers.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Davis

customer_reviews.title: they are not original..
customer_reviews.text: I would like to send them back because they seem to be used and they do not seem original to me..
customer_reviews.author: Ionescu Alexandru C

customer_reviews.title: They are fake!!
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, the shoes arrived all dirty, with white spots, as shown in other customers review's pictures. Secondly, whenever you walk they make a very loud noise,v like a squeak! Whenever you make a step, everyone stares at you and like they ask themselves: "Why the hell does he squeaks! so much?", just horribly. Thirdly, after 7 months the bottom of the shoe came out!!!!! Finally, I went to a Nike Store, and they confirmed, these sneakers are FAKE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SIZE MATTERS!
customer_reviews.text: A little tight at first but now so comfortable to wear. Wear on general basis. Word of advice buy your exact size because if you buy to big the sole doesn't fit you foot very well and can be very uncomfortable. I did this when I bought a size 10 instead of a Size 9/9.5 and wore them around London to find by the end of the day my feet were aching but in the 9s I have now. Perfect fit and are very comfortable. Size Matters!
customer_reviews.author: FLEX_xcx

customer_reviews.title: Fakes
customer_reviews.text: Fake trainers and the seller can’t even reply back when I’ve message not happy at all stiching all in wrong place left trainer different to the right one aswel
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Look naff and fake but are genuine i think
customer_reviews.text: They look fake, i sent these back. I think they were genuine but i have seen fakes that look better than these!
customer_reviews.author: David and Rachel

customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Bought for travelling. Lightweight and dry quickly. Would recommend

customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 13yr old. He loves them. Quite a reasonable price for mens trainers as he's a size 8.

customer_reviews.title: Good trainers

customer_reviews.title: Good fit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: order larger size

customer_reviews.title: The squeek in my shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed as my shoes have been sqeeking since I've had them and tbh the noise make me angry but if they didn't squeek they would of been excellent

customer_reviews.title: Fab trainers great colour comfy and at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Fab trainers great colour comfy and at a reasonable price

customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend loves them. They don’t look as good until you put them on.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but small
customer_reviews.text: I’ve given these 1 🌟 only because they didn’t fit, it’s not that they’re not quality they are, but for the first time ever I need a size larger. So anyone considering buying these you may need to go up a size.

customer_reviews.title: Nike
customer_reviews.text: Next day delivery. Am well pleased with these trainers, I take size 9 and bought same. They are very snug, but not too tight. My son has a pair and happy I took his advise.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic

customer_reviews.title: Very suitable bartender workers and solid.
customer_reviews.text: Superb Comfortable with longest walk hours no pain heel. Definite buy this same brand shoes in the future. Top running or traveller everywhere. No complain about that. Just right size 9.5 uk.

customer_reviews.title: Present.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son at a great price. Fitted well and he was very happy with them.

customer_reviews.title: I received a size different from the requested as per size cart .
customer_reviews.text: I received a size different from the requested as per size cart .

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: These trainers are fake. I have compared them to my shop bought hurache and these are definitely not real. They even have the audacity to send them in a size 10 box with stickers, when the trainers are 9.5. Keep away... So annoyed I’ve got to and waste my time sending them back.. I bought them when they reduced to £65.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Air Huarache Run Ultra Shoes
product_meta.description: The Nike Air Huarache Ultra shoe features a mesh and perforated foam upper with a midsole / outsole combination for maximum breathability and lightweight comfort. The elastic pull strap and the rubber cage on the heel give the classic Huarache look.
feature_bullets: Model - NIKE AIR HUARACHE RUN ULTRA
